snippet: A former clerk was charged with embezzling more than $1 million from the New York Archdiocese.
abstract: Anita Collins, former clerk charged with embezzling more than $1 million from the Archdiocese of New York, plans to plead guilty and will agree to more than four years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A former clerk was charged with embezzling more than $1 million from the New York Archdiocese.

headline.seo: Anita Clark, Ex-Clerk at New York Archdiocese, to Make Plea Deal in Embezzlement Case
headline.main: Plea Deal Set After Theft at Archdiocese
headline.print_headline: Plea Deal Set After Theft At Archdiocese
